field.value: ValidateEmail attribute does not work properly in Monorail Scarfold

field.name: description
field.value:
I have applied ValidateEmail attribute to my ActiveRecord class email attribute, seems the script does not validate properly, even the email is valid it does not pass thru the validation. Also it does not show up appropriate error message on screen, only the field is highlighted. Issue tested in IE7 and Firefox with same result.
I have confirmed the issue is due to email|2 validation setup. For some reason email|2 does not allow email with numbers before @ to be validated properly. For example:
abc@abc.com- this would work abc1@abc.com- this would fail
